docs.lead_paragraph: MATERNAL DESIRE On Children, Love, and the Inner Life By Daphne de Marneffe 401 pages. Little, Brown & Company. $25.95. A friend says that at cocktail parties she often gets the greet and turn: as soon as she mentions that she is a stay-at-home mom, her conversation partner abruptly turns his head and walks away.
docs.abstract: Patricia Cohen reviews book Maternal Desire: On Children, Love, and the Inner Life by Daphne de Marneffe; photo (M)
